A stack of books:
After the death of her students and Solina gathered at the monastery, locked the door, stopped communicating with the outside world and began to create his own. Since then, the kingdom Elmoreden did not stop the uprising and storms. So underground community called Embryo which had huge impact in some parts of the continent. Kingdom Elmoreden after Emperor Frintezza signed a contract with evil spirits and went to the Tomb of the Empire, was destroyed. So the first thing of the history of the united kingdom people.
